sources.name: DelimitedText1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  DelimitedText1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared DelimitedText1 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://ashishacc.dfs.core.windows.net/cont1/tripfolder/TripData.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = DelimitedText1,
  #"Replaced value" = Table.ReplaceValue(Source, "VTS", "ASHISHvts", Replacer.ReplaceValue, {"vendor_id"}),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Replaced value", {"medallion"}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Removed columns", each ([rate_code] = "1" or [rate_code] = "3"))
in
  #"Filtered rows";
